Skin infections can occur when open wounds or cuts come into contact with contaminated soil. If your skin is affected, you can experience:
    
     - Ulcers
     - Nodules sometimes draining and spreading along lymph nodes",CDC,Nocardiosis
What are the treatments for Nocardiosis ?,"If you think you might be sick with nocardiosis, talk to your doctor.
